intro: Hereroa nelii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, waxy leaves and showy, clustered flowers. Hereroa nelii is known for its ability to bloom throughout the year under proper care.
